title: AI Translator
description: A simple AI-powered text translator built with Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite, Cloudflare Workers and deployed on Cloudflare Pages. Translates text from English to languages like French, Spanish and Japanese.

title: Coding Game
description: A simple word-guessing game built with React where players must guess a hidden word.

title: Dice Game
description: A simple React-based dice game inspired by Tenzies built using React JS and Vite.
